import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { invoiceContext } from "../../../../store/invoiceStore"; import "./BillFrom.css"; function BillFrom() { const { invoiceState, updateInvoice } = useContext(invoiceContext); //Function used on form and reusable accross all fields by referencing the "name" property //Global state is updated in real time function formChangeHandler(e) { updateInvoice({ type: e.target.name, value: e.target.value }); } return (

Bill From

 ); } export default BillFrom;
